category: Regulations for overseas Korean sports organizations/Article 2 (Application documents for designation of overseas Korean sports organizations)
contents: Article 2 (Application documents for designation as an overseas Korean sports organization) The documents that must be submitted in order to be designated as an overseas Korean sports organization representing the country by the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council) are as follows. 1. Application for designation as an overseas Korean sports organization (Form No. 1 attached) 2. Letter of recommendation from the Korean embassy stationed in the relevant country (Form No. 2 attached) 3. Letter of introduction to the organization (including history, organization, composition status, etc.) 4. Articles of incorporation and regulations of the organization 5. List of executive officers and letter of acceptance of inauguration 6. Business plan and budget for the current year, previous year's settlement statement 7. Minutes of the general meeting of the current year and the previous year 8. Status of member organizations (branch, member organization, etc.)
